title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonics
b. No validation on the type field. The existence of the type is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for super class), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName
f. The label could say 'Select destination type:'
g. The browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)
c. The title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'
Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
e. The destination type can be the source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
OB: The browse button is too small and needs to be resized.
EB: The browse button should have a standard size using SWTUtil.
SR:
1. Open the dialog that contains the browse button.
2. Observe the size of the browse button.
